channel.title: Help on xp and removing objects & setting levels and ip setup please
channel.description: well first off i need help chainging the xp gain and also removing the objects and setting the stats but i need most help on the ip i got ip duc and setup a ip name but is a blushie face and it wont work got and suggestions please help me :( :( :(

item.title: Help on xp and removing objects & setting levels and ip setup please
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

[code=c_mac]case 411:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You Get, What’s This??? Cash!”);
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
addItem(10717, 1);
addItem(10720, 1);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[5]), 5);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[6]), 6);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2465:
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[6]), 6);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[3]), 3);
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
break;
case 2513:
if(actionTimer == 0) { //range
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
actionName = “range1”;
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(426);
addItem(10714, 1);
addSkillXP((4000*playerLevel[4]), 4);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2873:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addItem(10705, 1);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2874:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addItem(10708, 1);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2875:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(1978);
addItem(10711, 1);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[1]), 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2514:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Congratz you get exp”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addItem(10714, 1);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[4]), 0);
addSkillXP((4000playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;[/code]

this is whAT I FOUND how do i make it so they gain 10 xp per hit?
[br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2007, 03:12:56 PM[/size][hr]this == addSkillXP((10playerLevel[4]), 0);
to this == ???addSkillXP((10playerLevel[3]), 3);

Read full topic

item.title: Help on xp and removing objects & setting levels and ip setup please
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

[quote=“mathew000000000, post:3, topic:156085”]case 2873: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("go to ::train or ::ice!"); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[3]), 3); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break
so i look for this and change?

addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[0]), 0);

no you search whatever the ID # is of what you train on

item.source: Help on xp and removing objects & setting levels and ip setup please

item.title: Help on xp and removing objects & setting levels and ip setup please
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

changing the xp gain ,

open client.java and search the ID of the object that gives the experience for example:
id search 2873 , because thats what i train levels on , you should get something like this

case 2873: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("go to ::train or ::ice!"); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[3]), 3); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

now change this

addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[3]), 3);

make the 1 or whatever yours is , to the experience you want it to give

Read full topic
